Value: Horseshoe Metals Limited engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Australia. The company explores for copper and gold deposits. It owns 100% interests in the Horseshoe Lights project that comprises seven tenements located in Meekatharra; and the Kumarina project that consists of a small mining lease and a mining lease covering approximately 3.2 square kilometers located in the Gascoyne region of Western Australia. The company also owns 50% interest in the Mt Gunson copper project; and 100% interest in the Glenloth gold project located in South Australia. Horseshoe Metals Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Balcatta, Australia.
